comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: A nice bit of colouring on the card but it must have been spectacular back on the day itself?

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] I think it would have been very impressive. There was also a massive firework display on the Harbour. Read All About It - including an engraving of the scene at the Town Hall (half an hour later!!) - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/page/1312681

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: And a visiting American electrician was very impressed - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/114754930

comment.author: 80456351@N00
comment._content: I like the ghosts the lighting is giving off.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Hey if they can knock the socks off a visiting American electrician in 1908 - imagine what they'll conjur up this weekend? :)

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] It's going to be huge. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/la_belle_province] International Fleet Review in Sydney - www.navy.gov.au/ifr/

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/la_belle_province] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Well the best of luck for the weekend and I hope theres some "mighty craic" (Irish term) there!
